trans-unit.source: Interactive VISA control to test your SCPI commands

seg-source.mrk: Interactive VISA control to test your SCPI commands

target.mrk: Interactive VISA control to test your SCPI commands

trans-unit.source: [optional] The name of the file in which the SCPI commands issued during the interactive session will be saved.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the file in which the SCPI commands issued during the interactive session will be saved.

target.mrk: The name of the file in which the SCPI commands issued during the interactive session will be saved.

trans-unit.source: If no filename is passed the funcion asks the user where does he wants to save the issued commands.

seg-source.mrk: If no filename is passed the funcion asks the user where does he wants to save the issued commands.

target.mrk: If no filename is passed the funcion asks the user where does he wants to save the issued commands.

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of AutoIt3 VISA commands that were executed by the tool.

seg-source.mrk: Returns the list of AutoIt3 VISA commands that were executed by the tool.

target.mrk: Returns the list of AutoIt3 VISA commands that were executed by the tool.

trans-unit.source: This is the same list that is saved into the file if the a filename is passed to the function.

seg-source.mrk: This is the same list that is saved into the file if the a filename is passed to the function.

target.mrk: This is the same list that is saved into the file if the a filename is passed to the function.

trans-unit.source: Type "FIND" in the Device Descriptor query to perform a GPIB search.

seg-source.mrk: Type "FIND" in the Device Descriptor query to perform a GPIB search.

target.mrk: Type "FIND" in the Device Descriptor query to perform a GPIB search.

trans-unit.source: This function lets you easily test your SCPI commands interactively.

seg-source.mrk: This function lets you easily test your SCPI commands interactively.

target.mrk: This function lets you easily test your SCPI commands interactively.

trans-unit.source: It also lets you save these commands into a file.

seg-source.mrk: It also lets you save these commands into a file.

target.mrk: It also lets you save these commands into a file.

trans-unit.source: Simply answer the questions (Device Descriptor, SCPI command and timeout).

seg-source.mrk: Simply answer the questions (Device Descriptor, SCPI command and timeout).

target.mrk: Simply answer the questions (Device Descriptor, SCPI command and timeout).

trans-unit.source: * If you click Cancel on the 1st question the interactive control ends.

seg-source.mrk: * If you click Cancel on the 1st question the interactive control ends.

target.mrk: * If you click Cancel on the 1st question the interactive control ends.

trans-unit.source: * If you click Cancel to the other queries, you will go back to the Device Descriptor question.

seg-source.mrk: * If you click Cancel to the other queries, you will go back to the Device Descriptor question.

target.mrk: * If you click Cancel to the other queries, you will go back to the Device Descriptor question.
